result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shad S Rades

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shad S Rades in court.  Attorney Kevin Gaertner for Benjamin Wallis Lutgen in court for Shad S Rades.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Matter set for DPA hearing.  As there is no court reporter available to take the record, matter must be adjourned.Case is adjourned to Br. 1.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Shad S Rades in court with attorney Zachary Hoff for Attorney Benjamin Wallis Lutgen.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Hearing held via Zoom. HEARING HELD OFF THE RECORD.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Hoff has received discovery and an offer and would like a DPA hearing date.  Case adjourned to Br. 1.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Shad S Rades in court with attorney Benjamin Wallis Lutgen.  John Daniel Flynn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney. Defendant plead not guilty.  
Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 01.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 7/6/22 @ 1p
